description.value: You know more kitsune magic. During your daily preparations, choose @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Bane]{Bane}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Illusory Object]{Illusory Object}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Sanctuary]{Sanctuary}. You can cast this as a 1st-level divine innate spell once that day.

value.value: at least one innate spell from a kitsune heritage or ancestry feat
